Menu

The midlands' premiere indoor karting experience

Book NowPrice List

Race Packages

The perfect choice for team building, stag/hen parties and group events! Pit your skill and endurance against each other with our selection of Grand Prix and Endurance race packages. Racing times range from 30 to 150 minutes with food provided on-site.

View Prices

Juniors & Parties

Go-karting makes a great birthday party or family event for up to 8 people. Our junior packages include up to one hour of track time per driver, a hot meal and drinks in our private corporate lounge overlooking the track, plus medals and a trophy for the birthday host.

View Prices

Arrive & Drive

There's no need to book for small groups - turn up at any time and we'll drive for up to 100 laps! Drivers aged 12 years or older are welcome anytime as long as the track is available. High performance 200cc karts are available for ages 14 and over.

View Prices

Corporate & Group Events

When looking to book your next Event, look no further. Hosting your Corporate or Group Event at Fast Lane Karting will ensure a safe, friendly and exhilarating night with on-site catering and Corporate Lounge.

Run by professional people who care.

View Prices

Sign up to receive the latest news, offers and discounts

About Us

Fastlane Karting is located in Fenton, Stoke on Trent, Staffordshire and within easy driving distance of Shropshire, Cheshire and Derbyshire in the East Midlands. We operate Biz karts for Corporate & Group Parties, and Sprint karts for our arrive & drive sessions. We also have Go-Karts for kids.
